title: 【Student Dormitory】Deposit and Claim of Luggage Services
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 學務處 - 鍾佩玲 - free22011@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03890-6217
對象： 全校學生_大一_大二_大三_大四以上_碩士生_博士生
標題： 【Student Dormitory】Deposit and Claim of Luggage Services
日期： Thu, 29 Aug 2024 13:53:19 +0800

Dear All,
    In order to facilitate smooth transition upon your return for the new semester, Student Dormitory Committee Members will be available to assist you to claim your luggage starting on 2024/09/04(Wed).

1. Time for luggage claim:
 (1) 2024/09/04(Wed)：
　   15:00 - 17:00
　   19:00 - 21:00
 (2) 2024/09/05(Thu)-09/08(Sun)：
       10:00 - 12:00
       14:00 - 18:00
　   19:00 - 21:00	
 (3) 2024/09/09(Mon)-09/11(Wed)：
       19:00 - 21:00

2. Overtime luggage claim 
 Any luggage not claimed by 2024/09/22(Sun) will be gathered to a different location. 
　 
Please be reminded of the above rules for your own rights and interests. Claim your luggage where it was deposited previously by schedule. For any questions or concerns, please contact: Ms. Chung at (03)890-6217.

Wishing you a happy return-to-campus day!

~ Office of Student Affairs and Life Division ~
